actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend title 6 of the Canal Zone to permit, under appropriate controls, the sale in the Canal Zone of lottery tickets issued by the Government of the Republic of Panama.

summary.text: Authorizes the Governor of the Panama Canal Zone to issue a permit for conducting a raffle or gift enterprise whenever it appears to him that the proceeds of the enterprise are to be used for charitable purposes. Permits the sale of lottery tickets issued by the Government of Panama in the Canal Zone.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 6 of the Canal Zone to permit, under appropriate controls, the sale in the Canal Zone of lottery tickets issued by the Government of the Republic of Panama.
